resources.string: NammaBangalore
Namma Bangalore
Start Exploring
The Silicon Valley Of India

Bangalore or Benguluru is the "Silicon Valley of India" and is also famous for its natural charm owing to several green parks surrounding the city. The capital city of Karnataka is full of energy as it is a beautiful amalgamation of culture and modernity!
Explore
Places
Parks
Temples
Restaurants
More..
Hello blank fragment
Places Image
Cubbon Park
Title
Address
Opening Hours
Cubbon Park
Address: Kasturba Rd, behind High Court of Karnataka, Ambedkar Veedhi, Sampangi Rama Nagara, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Opens At: Tuesday to Sunday between 6 AM and 6 PM
Cubbon Park, officially Sri Chamarajendra Park, is a landmark park in Bengaluru, located in the heart of the city in the Central Administrative Area.
Wonderla Amusement Park
Address: 28th km, Mysore Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 562109
Opens At: Everyday from 11:00 AM to 07:00 PM
Amusement park with roller coasters, a ferris wheel and water rides, plus virtual reality experiences. Tickets varies as per age.
Bannerghatta National Park
Address: Bengaluru, Karnataka 560083
Opens At: 09:30 AM – 05:00 PM daily, except on Tuesdays
It was founded in 1970 and declared as a national park in 1974. In 2002, a small portion of the park became a zoological garden, the Bannerghatta Biological Park. Tickets varies as per age.
Bugle Rock Park
Address: WHV9+3QM, Bull Temple Rd, Basavanagudi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560019
Opens At: Everyday from 5:30 – 10 AM and 4 – 8:30 PM
Serene park shaded by a tree canopy featuring gardens, waterfalls and fountains, plus three temples.
Vidhana Soudha
Address: XHHR+R8X, Ambedkar Bheedhi, Sampangi Rama Nagara, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Opens At: Monday to Friday 10:00 AM - 5:30 PM (Closed on weekends and public holidays)
Vidhana Soudha is a building in Bangalore, India which serves as the seat of the state legislature of Karnataka. It is constructed in Neo-Dravidian style and completed in 1956.
Lalbagh Botanical Garden
Address: Mavalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560004
Opens At: Everyday 9 AM - 5 PM

Lalbagh Botanical Garden or Lalbagh, is an botanical garden in Bangalore, with an over 200-year history. First planned and laid out during the dalavaiship of Hyder Ali, the garden was later managed under numerous British Superintendents before Indian Independence.
Bengaluru Palace
Address: Bengaluru, Karnataka
Opens At: Tuesday to Sunday 10 AM to 5:30 PM, Closed on Mondays
Bangalore Palace is a 19th century royal palace located in Bangalore, India, in an area that was owned by the Rev. John Garrett, the first principal of the Central High School in Bangalore
The Black Pearl
Address: Vikas Tech Park, 105, 4th Floor, Jyoti Nivas College Rd, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095
Opens At: Everyday 11 AM - 4 PM, 6 PM - 11:30 PM

Themed bar and global eatery offering diverse dishes and a buffet amid pirate decor and nautical accents. 
 Service options: 
 - Reservations required 
 - Has all you can eat 
 - Serves vegetarian dishes
High Ultra Lounge
Address: 26/1, Rooftop, World Trade Center, Dr Rajkumar Rd, Malleshwaram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560055
Opens At: Everyday 4 PM - 1 AM

Sleek, modern venue offering far-reaching views over the city, DJ music and a varied Asian menu. 
 Service options: 
 - Has rooftop seating 
 - Has outdoor seating 
 - Has live music
Byg Brewski Brewing
Address: SOUTHERN ASIA BIBLE COLLEGE, 22, Hennur Bagalur Main Rd, Visthar, Byrathi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560077
Opens At: Everyday 12 PM - 1 AM

Service options: 
 - Has live performances 
 - Has karaoke 
 - Serves food at bar
Gufha Restaurant
Address: 79/8, Diagonal Rd, Jaya Nagar 1st Block, Jayanagar 3rd Block, Jayanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
Opens At: Everyday 12 PM - 4 PM, 7 PM - 11 PM

Unique, cave-themed restaurant and bar in a hotel serving Continental, Chinese and Indian fare. 
 Service options: 
 - Has all you can eat 
 - Has private dining room 
 - Serves vegetarian dishes
ISKCON Temple
Address: Hare Krishna Hill, Chord Rd, Rajajinagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560010
Opens At: Monday to Friday 7:15 AM - 1 PM, 4:15 PM - 8:20 PM, Saturday and Sunday 7:15 AM - 8:20 PM

Sri Radha Krishna-Chandra Temple is one of the largest Krishna-Hindu temples in the world. The temple is dedicated to Hindu deities Radha Krishna and propagates monotheism as mentioned in Chandogya Upanishad.
Kote Shri Prasanna Venkataramana Swami Temple
Address: 39, Krishna Rajendra Rd, Kalasipalya, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560002
Opens At: Monday to Sunday 8 AM - 12 PM, 6 PM - 8 PM
The temple was built in 1689 in Dravidian and Vijayanagara style by King Chikka Devaraja Wodeyar, then ruler of Mysore.
St. Marks Cathedral
Address: 1, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Shivaji Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
"Opens At: Monday Closed \n Tuesday to Friday 9:30 AM to 5 PM \n Saturday and Sunday 9:30 AM to 1 PM"
St. Marks Cathedral, dedicated to Saint Mark the Evangelist, is the cathedral of the Diocese of Central Karnataka of the Church of South India.
Shrungagiri Sri Shanmukha Swami Gudi
Address: BEML, Kempegowda Rd, 5th Stage, Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560098
Opens At: Monday to Sunday 7 AM - 12:30 PM and 4:30 AM - 9 PM
Prayer complex with a soaring temple tower featuring the six faces of Hindu deity Lord Shanmukha.
Omkar Hills
Address: Omkar Hills, Shrinivasapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560060
Opens At: Monday to Saturday 7 AM - 12:45 PM, Sunday 7 AM - 9 PM
This is a beautiful white temple dedicated to Lord Shiva. There are twelve jyotirlingas within the temple and one parikrama around the temple will take you on a spiritual journey across India.
Nageshwara Temple Complex
Address: BBMP office, Begur Rd, opposite to Begur, Begur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068
Opens At: Monday to Sunday 6: 30 AM - 11:30 AM, 5:30 PM - 8 PM

The Nageshvara temple complex is located in Begur, Bangalore. Two shrines within the temple complex, the Nageshvara and Nageshvarasvami were commissioned during the rule of Western Ganga Dynasty Kings Nitimarga I and Ereyappa Nitimarga II.
